_A_LINK_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: Provides a connection to an internal or external source that the user can access by clicking or keyboard tapping.
_A_LINK_EXAMPLE_BIG_TITLE_:
This is a multiline tooltip.
The content is provided in HTML format.
_A_LINK_GROUP_BASIC_DESCRIPTION_: The link is defined by the visible text and an internal (to) or external (href) refrence that the link points to.
_A_LINK_GROUP_CLASS_DESCRIPTION_: CSS classes enable different visual representations of the component.
_A_LINK_GROUP_COMPLEX_DESCRIPTION_: An example of a more complex usage of  ALink component.
_A_LINK_GROUP_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION_: When a disabled state is applied to ALink, the user is not allowed to interact with the component.
_A_LINK_GROUP_GROUP_DESCRIPTION_: Series of ALink components can be wrapped in a group using CSS.
_A_LINK_GROUP_GROUP_HORIZONTAL_VERTICAL_: Series of ALink components can be wrapped in a group vertically and horizontally using CSS.
_A_LINK_GROUP_GROUP_SIZES_DESCRIPTION_: CSS sizing can be applied to each group in place of applying sizing class to each ALink separately.
_A_LINK_GROUP_GROUP_VERTICAL_DESCRIPTION: Series of ALink components can be wrapped in a group vertically using CSS.
_A_LINK_GROUP_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The anchor text can be specified in HTML format. The content will be sanitized.
_A_LINK_GROUP_ICONS_DESCRIPTION_: A custom icon can be provided in place of, or next to the anchor text.
_A_LINK_GROUP_LOADING_DESCRIPTION_: A spinner can be placed on either side of anchor text to indicate a loading state.
_A_LINK_GROUP_OUTLINE_DESCRIPTION_: In addition to modifier CSS classes, outline classes can be used to remove the colorful background, leaving the outline.
_A_LINK_GROUP_SAFE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The anchor text can be specified in HTML format using the safe-html parameter. This content is considered safe and will not be sanitized.
_A_LINK_GROUP_SIZES_DESCRIPTION_: Additional sizes of the component are also achievable using CSS.
_A_LINK_GROUP_SLOT_APPEND_DESCRIPTION_: A content to be appended to anchor text can be defined by using appendLink slot.
_A_LINK_GROUP_SLOT_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION_: Instead of text parameter,a default slot can be used to define custom anchor content.
_A_LINK_GROUP_SLOT_PREPEND_DESCRIPTION_: A content to be preppended to anchor text can be defined by using prependLink slot.
_A_LINK_GROUP_SLOT_TITLE_DESCRIPTION_: A custom content can be defined to be shown when a mouse hovers over component by using linkTitle slot.
_A_LINK_GROUP_TEXT_AFTER_BEFORE_DESCRIPT: A custom character or text can be added before of after the anchor text.
_A_LINK_GROUP_TEXT_OBJECT_DESCRIPTION_: Different anchor texts can be specified for different screen sizes.
_A_LINK_GROUP_TITLE_ARRAY_DESCRIPTION_: Additional piece(s) of information can be shown when a mouse hovers over component.
_A_LINK_GROUP_TITLE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: A multi-line information in HTML format can be shown when a mouse hovers over component.
_A_LINK_GROUP_TRANSPARENT_DESCRIPTION_: In addition to modifier CSS classes, transparent classes can be used to blend the link into background.
_A_LINK_PROPS_ATTRIBUTES_DESCRIPTION_: Non-prop attributes to be passed to component.
_A_LINK_PROPS_EXTRA_DESCRIPTION_: Extra values used in translation placeholders.
_A_LINK_PROPS_HREF_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to.
_A_LINK_PROPS_HTML_SCREEN_READER_DESCRIP: Anchor content in HTML format for screen reader.
_A_LINK_PROPS_ICON_ATTRIBUTES_DESCRIPTIO: Non-prop attributes to be passed to icon.
_A_LINK_PROPS_ICON_LEFT_DESCRIPTION_: Name of the icon to be shown to the left of anchor text.
_A_LINK_PROPS_ICON_RIGHT_DESCRIPTION_: Name of the icon to be shown to the right of anchor text.
_A_LINK_PROPS_ICON_TAG_DESCRIPTION_: Tag of the inline HTML element which will then be used to display icon.
_A_LINK_PROPS_ID_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies a unique ID for the HTML element corresponding to link.
_A_LINK_PROPS_IS_TITLE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies if the regular title or HTML tooltip are shown when a mouse hovers over component.
_A_LINK_PROPS_LOADING_ALIGN_DESCRIPTION_: A CSS alignment of the loading spinner.
_A_LINK_PROPS_LOADING_CLASS_DESCRIPTION_: A CSS class for loading spinner.
_A_LINK_PROPS_LOADING_DESCRIPTION_: Displays spinner next to anchor text that indicates loading.
_A_LINK_PROPS_SAFE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: Anchor content in HTML format to be displayed.
_A_LINK_PROPS_SAFE_HTML_SCREEN_READER_DE: Anchor content in HTML format for screen reader, without sanitation.
_A_LINK_PROPS_TARGET_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies where the linked content will be open after clicking the link.
_A_LINK_PROPS_TEXT_AFTER_DESCRIPTION_: Additional character or text displayed to the right of the anchor text.
_A_LINK_PROPS_TEXT_ARIA_HIDDEN_DESCRIPTI: Anchor text hidden from screen readers.
_A_LINK_PROPS_TEXT_BEFORE_DESCRIPTION_: Additional character or text displayed to the left of the anchor text.
_A_LINK_PROPS_TEXT_CLASS_DESCRIPTION_: Additional CSS class for anchor text.
_A_LINK_PROPS_TITLE_DESCRIPTION_: Additional piece(s) of information to be shown when a mouse hovers over component.
_A_LINK_PROPS_TITLE_PLACEMENT_DESCRIPTIO: A position relative to the link where the title will be displayed.
_A_LINK_PROPS_TO_DESCRIPTION_: Internal link to another component by using Vue Router.
_A_LINK_SLOT_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION_: Can be used to define the anchor content of the link.
_A_LINK_SLOT_LINK_APPEND_DESCRIPTION_: Appends custom content to the anchor text.
_A_LINK_SLOT_LINK_PREPEND_DESCRIPTION_: Prepends custom content to the anchor text.
_A_LINK_SLOT_LINK_TITLE_DESCRIPTION_: Displays custom information when a mouse hovers over component.
